verses.verse: But in the <S%H319>last<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> it shall come to <S%H2022>pass<s%>, that the mountain of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall be <S%H3559>established<s%> in the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, and it shall be <S%H5375>exalted<s%> above the <S%H1389>hills<s%>; and <S%H5971>people<s%> shall flow unto <S%H5102>it<s%>.

And <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall <S%H1980>come<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H3212>Come<s%>, and let us go <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>; and he will <S%H3384>teach<s%> us of his <S%H1870>ways<s%>, and we will <S%H3212>walk<s%> in his <S%H734>paths<s%>: for the <S%H8451>law<s%> shall go <S%H3318>forth<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, and the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

And he shall <S%H8199>judge<s%> among <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>, and <S%H3198>rebuke<s%> <S%H6099>strong<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> afar <S%H7350>off<s%>; and they shall <S%H3807>beat<s%> their <S%H2719>swords<s%> into <S%H855>plowshares<s%>, and their <S%H2595>spears<s%> into <S%H4211>pruninghooks<s%>: <S%H1471>nation<s%> shall not lift <S%H5375>up<s%> a <S%H2719>sword<s%> against <S%H1471>nation<s%>, neither shall they <S%H3925>learn<s%> war any <S%H4421>more<s%>.

But they shall <S%H3427>sit<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> under his <S%H1612>vine<s%> and under his fig <S%H8384>tree<s%>; and none shall make them <S%H2729>afraid<s%>: for the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> has spoken <S%H1696>it<s%>.

For all <S%H5971>people<s%> will <S%H3212>walk<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of his <S%H430>god<s%>, and we will <S%H3212>walk<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever<s%>.

In that <S%H3117>day<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, will I <S%H622>assemble<s%> her that <S%H6760>limps<s%>, and I will <S%H6908>gather<s%> her that is driven <S%H5080>out<s%>, and her that I have <S%H7489>afflicted<s%>;

And I will <S%H7760>make<s%> her that <S%H6760>limped<s%> a <S%H7611>remnant<s%>, and her that was cast far <S%H1972>off<s%> a <S%H6099>strong<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%>: and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H4427>reign<s%> over them in <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%> from <S%H5704>henceforth<s%>, even for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.

And <S%H4026>you<s%>, O tower of the <S%H5739>flock<s%>, the strong <S%H6076>hold<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, unto you shall it <S%H857>come<s%>, even the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H4475>dominion<s%>; the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

Now why do you <S%H7321>cry<s%> out <S%H7452>aloud<s%>? is there no <S%H4428>king<s%> in <S%H3289>you<s%>? is your counselor <S%H6>perished<s%>? for <S%H2427>pangs<s%> have <S%H2388>taken<s%> you as a woman in <S%H3205>hardship<s%>.

Be in <S%H2342>pain<s%>, and labor to bring <S%H1518>forth<s%>, O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, like a woman in <S%H3205>hardship<s%>: for now shall you go <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H7151>city<s%>, and you shall <S%H7931>live<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%>, and you shall <S%H935>go<s%> even to <S%H894>Babylon<s%>; there shall you be <S%H5337>delivered<s%>; there the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H1350>redeem<s%> you from the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of your <S%H341>enemies<s%>.

Now also <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> are <S%H622>gathered<s%> against <S%H559>you<s%>, that say, Let her be <S%H2610>defiled<s%>, and let our <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H2372>look<s%> upon <S%H6726>Zion<s%>.

But they <S%H3045>know<s%> not the <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, neither <S%H995>understand<s%> they his <S%H6098>counsel<s%>: for he shall <S%H6908>gather<s%> them as the <S%H5995>sheaves<s%> into the <S%H1637>floor<s%>.

<S%H6965>Arise<s%> and <S%H1758>thresh<s%>, O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>: for I will <S%H7760>make<s%> your <S%H7161>horn<s%> <S%H1270>iron<s%>, and I will <S%H7760>make<s%> your <S%H6541>hoofs<s%> <S%H5154>brass<s%>: and you shall beat in <S%H1854>pieces<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>: and I will <S%H2763>consecrate<s%> their <S%H1215>gain<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and their <S%H2428>substance<s%> unto the <S%H113>Lord<s%> of the whole <S%H776>earth<s%>.
